sentences.en: A 10~ ( - 14 ) A pico - ampere current meter made of integrated circuit CA 3420 is presented.
sentences.cn: 用集成电路CA3420可制成10~ ( -14 ) A高灵敏微电流计.

sentences.en: A 15 ampere fuse melts if the current exceeds 15 amperes.
sentences.cn: 如果电流超过15安培,则15安培的保险丝就熔化.

sentences.en: A static magnetic field is measured in units of ampere per metre, (A/m) but is usually expressed in terms of the corresponding magnetic induction measured in units of tesla, (T) or millitesla (mT).
sentences.cn: 静电磁场以每米具有的安培单位衡量(A/m)，但是通常以相应的电磁感应单位特斯拉(T)或毫伏特斯拉(mT)表示。

sentences.en: A unit of electric current equal to one an ampere.
sentences.cn: 旧制电流单位(略小于一安培).

sentences.en: A unit of electric current equal to one millionth of an ampere.
sentences.cn: 微安(培)等于百万分之一安培的电流单位.

sentences.en: A unit of electrical resistance equal to that of a conductor in which a current of one ampere is produced by a potential of one volt across its terminals.
sentences.cn: 欧姆电阻单位，一段导体两端的电位差为伏特时产生一安培电流，那么这段导体的电阻就等于欧姆。

sentences.en: All range voltage, Ampere meter , can suit the demand of customer.
sentences.cn: 任意量程的交直流电压 、 电流表均可按用户要求供货.

sentences.en: Ampere meters can record the amount of electrical current passing through an electrical appliance.
sentences.cn: 电流表可以记录经过用电器的电流的数量。

sentences.en: Ampere The ampere is a unit of current flow.
sentences.cn: 安培安培是电流单元.

sentences.en: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.cn: 我还想要一个铝制的安培表，虽然它与另一个类似。

sentences.en: Andre Ampere , French physicist noted for his word on electrodynamices , died.
sentences.cn: 以研究电动力学称著的法国物理学家 安德烈·安培 逝世.

sentences.en: Built - in rotary switch, button, ampere meter, indicating lamp etc.
sentences.cn: 内装转换开关 、 电流表 、 按钮 、 指示灯等.

sentences.en: Disuse the ampere of power source and accumulator cell [ the armrest moves ].
sentences.cn: 不用安电源及蓄电池 [ 靠手动 ].

sentences.en: Five nanogenerators working together produced about 1 micro ampere output current at 3 volts about the same voltage generated by two regular AA batteries.
sentences.cn: 5个纳米发电机同时工作可以产生1微安培3伏特的输出电流，与2节普通的5号电池所产生的电压差不多。

sentences.en: Isabel, with her eyes bent, fingered the pages of M ? Ampere.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔垂下了眼皮, 用手指 拨弄 着安培的书.

sentences.en: One day, Mr Ampere go out for a walk in the street.
sentences.cn: 有一天, 安培先生去街上散步.

sentences.en: The centimeter - gram - second electromagnetic unit of magnetomotive force , equal to ampere - turn.
sentences.cn: 吉伯厘米 - 克 -秒 磁动势电磁单位, 等于!

sentences.en: The SI system therefore takes the ampere as one of its fundamental units.
sentences.cn: 因此,SI制取安培作为它的基本单位之一.

sentences.en: The units in which we show voltage and current are volt and ampere respectively.
sentences.cn: 我们用以表示电压和电流的单位分别为伏特和安培。

sentences.en: This piece of equipment needs a thirty - ampere fuse.
sentences.cn: 这设备需要30安培的熔丝.
